page.title: 09TRADE IN MELBOURNE
page.content: MELBOURNE IS A SELF_CONTAINED TOWN OF ABOUT 4000 PEOPLE WITH A LARGE VARIETY OF SHOPS AND SMALL BUSINESSES.IT SERVES THE SURROUNDING RURAL AREA ALTHOUGH MANY PEOPLE NOW TRAVEL TO THE NEARBY URBAN AREAS TO USE THE LARGE SHOPS AND SUPERMARKETS WHICH TEND TO HAVE CHEAPER PRICES.THERE ARE SEVERAL FOOD AND PROVISION SHOPS,1 SUPERMARKET AND SOME SMALL CORNER SHOPS THAT GET A LOT OF TRADE BECAUSE OF THEIR OPENING HOURS.THERE ARE 2 NEWSAGENTS,6 CLOTHING SHOPS,3 FRUITERERS, A CRAFT CENTRE AT MELBOURNE HALL,3 BUTCHERS, THE POST OFFICE,2 FURNITURE SALESROOMS SEVERAL ANTIQUE SHOPS,AN ART GALLERY,2 CAFES AND A TEA ROOM,2 SHOE SHOPS,A HARDWARE SHOP,A T.V. SHOP,AN ELECTRICAL SHOP,A BAKERS,BARBERS,5 HAIRDRESSERS,2 FISH AND CHIP SHOPS AND A WALLPAPER SHOP.THIS LIST SHOWS THE VARIETY OF MELBOURNE'S TRADES.
